trends: There have been 128 other sightings in Fort Worth
There were no other sightings in Fort Worth on or around January 8th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI walked out on to the back deck which faces south just after dark, I looked up towards the lower eastern sky and saw a light traveling from east to west which would be south of Fort Worth. It caught my eye because of the speed it was traveling, I knew it was not an airplane and thought for a second that it was a satellite. After watching it though I realized it wasn't a satellite either because of the shape. My friend and I had gone out on the deck to have a cigarette, and by the time I told him to come over and look it was gone. I was pretty excited about what I saw as he can tell you. But didn't report it until now after seeing the Stephenville story. It was fairly distant to me in Fort Worth, but now after reading about the Stephenville story, I would think that would be about the right distance and direction as what I saw. I'm positive this was not an airplane or satellite, there is nothing I've seen that travels that fast.
